Package com.kraken.krakenhax

Class EntrantInfoFragment

java.lang.Object
androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
com.kraken.krakenhax.EntrantInfoFragment
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, androidx.activity.result.ActivityResultCaller, androidx.lifecycle.HasDefaultViewModelProviderFactory, androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner, androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelStoreOwner, androidx.savedstate.SavedStateRegistryOwner
public class EntrantInfoFragment extends androidx.fragment.app.Fragment
A fragment that displays lists of entrants for a specific event. It allows viewing entrants who are waitlisted, enrolled, or have cancelled.

  • Nested Class Summary

    • updateRecyclerList

      private void updateRecyclerList(String status)
      Updates the recycler view to show entrants that match the given status. Periodically refreshes the list using a timer.
      Parameters:
      status - the entrant status list to display (e.g., Waitlisted, Won)
